collection_holder_name: McKissick Museum, South Carolina Broadcasters Association Archives
pageContext.collection_description: Image collections include photographic prints, negatives, and artwork related to the following broadcasters and stations: Jack Cook, Wallace A. "Wally" Mullinax Sr, Mackie Quave, G. Richard Shafto, George Dixon Stewart, James K. "Jim" Whitaker, WCRS, WESC, WIS, WOLS, and WSPA.
pageContext.collection_usage_statement: Contact SCBA Archives staff for reproduction policy.
